summary:
Beautiful Helena, she burnt out like a match but returned once more..
A standalone vampire follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]https://m-master.000webhostapp.com/helenamcr_zpshpbhafjf.png[/img]
[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/2b190b08d2f2adb8483bc8d96413200e/tumblr_n1ec26gCbU1ttb3o1o1_500.gif[/img]
[img]https://m-master.000webhostapp.com/hrelenatext_zpskj1v7lon.png[/img][size=6]
[color=#c27ba0][b][size=3]She is a Dawnguard DLC, which means you must own Dawnguard for her to work.[/size][/b][/color]
[/size]
This Mod adds a new standalone follower to the Skyrim Game 
she is inspired completely by the song and video of Helena by My Chemical Romance.
She was requested by a lovely lady and suggested to be added to Nexus. So I did.

She uses Sultry Voice, and if the dialog does not work then I suggest getting follower mods.
Or request me to change the voice

And she is a vampire that you can marry ;-)
Want the dress she wears in the Screenshots, get [b]
Apachii Divine Elegance Store[/b] and the Red Vampire Dress.

Her skin is a mix of 1 - 2k files.

[youtube]l2FBxj4z27U[/youtube]

[s]
[/s][color=#ffe599][s][u][b]UPDATE: [/b][/u]NEW NAME FOR ESP added as a optional file.[/s][u][b]

UPDATE 2: [/b][/u]I will re-make the whole folder names, but at this time
I have other projects, if anyone have the time to, link me
the result and i´ll test it. [/color]


[color=#ead1dc][size=5][b]Recommended mods :[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]
Extensible Follower Frameworkby [b]Expired[/b][/url][/center][size=6][center][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23796/?]Lively Followers by [b]PrinceShroob[/b][/url][b][/b][/size][/center][/size]

[size=6][center][color=#ffe599]LOCATION[/color][/center][/size][center]Shes in Whiterun at the Drunken Huntsman[/center]
                                                               [size=6][center] [color=#ffe599]COMBAT INFO[/color][/center][/size][center][size=6][/size][size=6][/size][size=6][size=2]Shes is a mix mage, but uses primary Vampire powers. [/size][/size][/center]

                                                                        [center][color=#ffe599]      [size=6]HOW TO INSTALL[/size][/color][/center][center]
Recommended :
Use NMM

[Manual]
Unpack the archive and copy the contents into your Skyrim install folder,
and activate in Data Files when loading Skyrim.

[color=#ffe599][size=5]KNOWN BUGS:[/size][/color][/center][center][/center]
She uses Sultry Voice, and dialog may not show Follow option .[b] Here are Mods that fix it:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul [/url]

[center][/center]
[color=#ffe599]                                                                    [size=6][b]THANKS AND CREDITS[/b][/size][/color]

KS Hairsdos by [b]Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
